short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that finds which companies have tracking scripts on your current site and provides links to privacy policies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScriptSniffer is a user-friendly browser extension from personaldata.info, crafted to enhance your online privacy effortlessly. With just one click, ScriptSniffer delves into web pages, uncovering scripts associated with well-known tracking companies.

ScriptSniffer does the detective work, so you don't have to. It presents its findings in a user-friendly list format, allowing you to quickly spot and understand the tracking companies operating behind the scenes. It also allows you to click on the tracking script domains to open their privacy policies when they are available.

Don't let online trackers have the upper hand. Take control with ScriptSniffer and browse the web with confidence, knowing exactly which companies are tracking you.
